body.p: The transliteration alphabet used in BTS is the following:
ʾ, ꜣ, j, y, i̯, ı͗, ï, i, ꜥ, w, u, u̯, a, e, b, p, f, m, n, r, l, h, ḥ, ḫ, ẖ, h̭, z, s, š, q, k, g, t, ṯ, d, ḏ
ꜣ, J, Y, I͗, I, ꜥ, W, U, A, B, P, F, M, N, R, L, H, Ḥ, Ḫ, ẖ, H̭, Z, S, Š, Q, K, G, T, Ṯ, D, Ḏ

ś, Ś, ḳ, Ḳ, ṭ, Ṭ, č, Č, č̣, Č̣
